data.actual_result: The menu stays open and wont close
data.expected_result: The menu should close after a few seconds
data.short_description: Menu when swiping your friends to left stays open
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the Friends Tab - Click on "All" - Swipe a lot of your friends to the left so that the "more" and "message" menu opens (swipe them fast)
